text: What a disaster my last visit was...Mind you, I had been coming here since I was a kid and after they reopened the store again. But I couldn't believe the service and food was here today. When we came in for dinner we were asked by one of â€¦More

text: Very Very Very Very Very Very Bad Customer Service. I Do Not Recommend Anybody To Order Here Or Go There. They're Very Disrespectful And Not Polite.

name: Nicky Taylor
text: I just ordered a dinner box with extra wings. However to my surprise there was a piece of hair in my pizza. Good thing I check my order before the delivery driver left. I was very disappointed with the way that the manager handled the â€¦More

name: Charlotte Acevedo
text: Iove the deals they have going here. That one deal where you 1st everything for $5 each is the best. Definitely helps save money and you're trying to feed a family of 5.

name: RaiRaiBrown
text: Inconsistent service, greasy, dark dungeon looking interior, food is best eaten fresh when Marco is working. They need a new manager fast! Plus they should PAY and TREAT their staff better but I doubt that will ever happen. It's a sorry â€¦More

name: Nickaila Daley
text: Don't waste your time ordering here. Employees are rude and they can't even get the order right.

name: Shauna Raymond
text: I had to order two times. The first time my bread sticks we're cold and had hair on them. The stores kind of a mess. The second order was good tho.

name: Aadil Latif
text: Because the food is delicious here also dessert Hershey Triple Chocolate Brownie and also the Hershey Chocolate Chip Cookie is superb. Great

name: Dan Brochu
text: Ordered a pizza today and was delighted.  Our local Pizza Hut in New London closed, and enjoyed a pizza from this location on the ride home.  The staff was friendly and the food was great.

name: Gary Nolan
text: Floors and tables dirty. This place is dark and depressing. Ordered and THEN saw the specials- wish I had known and saved myself a little money.

name: Madame Seals
text: Dude, worst pizza...ever. Was given an undercooked pizza. Never in my life have I had to keep cooking a pizza hut pizza at home. The place needed a good cleaning too.

name: praneeth parchuru
text: The pizza's are good, but the place isn't maintained well. Takeout is a best option here rather than eating in the restaurant.

name: EmJ Bland
text: I have attempted to get pizza from here three different times. The first, they told me that I could not order pick-up after 10:00, but the restaurant closed at 11pm. The second time, they would not answer the phone. The final time, we â€¦More

name: Joe Hudak
text: Worst service I have EVER had in my life. I order pizza for delivery after a hour and 20 minutes it didn't show up I call back and they ask if I still want it. Its a miracle this place is still open.

name: Adam Happy
text: I love pizza hut but unfortunately this one was not the greatest

name: Krystal Webb
text: Ordered the 2 medium any toppings pizza for 6.99 each online. With delivery fees and tax it came up to  $15.13, not a problem. But when the delivery guy brought my food it was only 1 pizza. I then called and spoke with a manager who then â€¦More

name: Kylie Delgado
text: This Pizza Hut is horrible! We ordered from there for the first time tonight and our order got here an hour and a half late. When our food finally arrived it was cold, and the delivery guy kept asking for money even though we paid with a card. He kept saying he didn't have proof how we paid. Dont waste your time or your money!

name: Jill Katz
text: Picked up a carry out order tonight and employees plus manager were great even when deal with extreamly rude and entitled customer. Guy kept wanting money off or a deal because they were out of pan pizzas. They handled situation â€¦More

text: I don't hate it it's just it closed

name: Tammy V
text: Oh. My. GOODNESS. We placed an hour and they said they'd be there in an hour.  Half an hour later, we call them because the guests are so very hungry, and the guy on the phone was SO RUDE. He asked me my name, put me on hold twice, talked â€¦More

There was no other customers in the restaurant. some girl on our way out asked if she can help us and thought that was funny.... place doesn't deserves to be in business

text:

name: Ana Duran
text: Our group of 5 was seated as soon as we arrived, as the whole place was empty. The table we were given had crumbs and chewed up food on the edges - it was improperly cleaned. People started flooding in and the waiter took a while to get to â€¦More

name: Mike Voyer
text: usually ok, I haven't had too much issues with them however the last time I ordered they messed up my wings. kinda sucked having to wait an extra hour while they re did my wings and deliver them again. disappointed that they also took the â€¦More

name: Jaydeep More
text: Neat, clean, excellent service, quality of food

name: Alyssa Gendreau
text: It's a Tuesday, 5pm at night. There are 4 people working and no one seated. I ordered my food online and went in to pick it up. When I got there the associate proceeded to count all of the money in the drawer and not acknowledge me. Then when he did my pizza wasn't even ready.

name: Ricardo
text: Love the food and the staff is very friendly

name: Jason Cross
text: Service was great. Food doesn't change but honestly I love Pizza Hut pizza so I'm fine with that.

name: Karen Gilbert
text: Called for a takeout order and the male phone operator hung up on me!  I was sitting in the parking lot ordering and asked my daughter a question, and he hung up the phone!   Stupid because I was going to order the large rather than a small!!!! I will never go back!!!

name: Ashley D.
text: Is this place even open??? I went earlier this week around 7pm and it was closed. Snow on the driveway was not plowed.

text: I called in the other day and told them I was in a hurry, they said it would only take 15min to make 1 pizza. I showed up 25 min. after i called and still had to wait another 45min. They had employees hanging out watching tv with a delivery â€¦More

name: Luke Latham
text: Food was really good and we were served fast!

name: Robin Gann
text: Absolute worst experience we've ever had at a Pizza Hut. We go every week in NH and love it, but stay clear of this restaurant! We ordered 4 pizzas (no drinks). Two were wrong. They all came out at different times. It's been over an hour â€¦More

name: Julie Pinto
text: The delivery people are very nice but the people who answer the phones are terrible. Last time I ordered, I was accused of putting in multiple orders and that someone was calling from my phone number??? Sometimes the pizza is good, but â€¦More
